description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Sexy Flight, a majestic adventure through the clouds. Many hot GIRLS will grace you with their presence as you fly past them.   Join the girls on a flying fantasy!
